background: Senior UI designer with 12 years at design-forward companies (Stripe, Linear, Vercel). Known for catching spacing issues that are 2px off. Carries a mental checklist of design principles.
goals: Verify consistent spacing rhythm across all elements
Look for alignment issues between elements
Evaluate whitespace balance and visual breathing room
Test responsive behavior at key breakpoints
Assess visual polish and attention to detail
behaviors: Zooms to 150%+ to catch subpixel issues
Notices orphaned text, widows, and raggedy line lengths

tasks.name: Evaluate homepage visual hierarchy at desktop
tasks.notes: Overall hierarchy is clear. Hero → Problem → How It Works flow is logical.

tasks.name: Check component consistency across sections
tasks.notes: Cards, buttons, and badges use consistent styling. Some height inconsistencies in card grids.

tasks.name: Test responsive breakpoints
tasks.notes: Responsive behavior is good overall. Some disconnects in step indicator section at tablet width.

tasks.name: Verify spacing consistency
tasks.notes: Found inconsistent card heights in Pillars section due to varying content lengths.

observations.description: Aurora gradient background effect in hero is subtle and polished
Typography hierarchy is clear: eyebrow → headline → subtitle → CTA
Observation badges use semantic colors consistently (green=success, purple=note, amber=confusion, pink=frustration)
Step indicators (1, 2, 3) are properly horizontally aligned with connectors
Persona avatar gradients are distinct and visually appealing
Comparison boxes have unequal heights - Traditional E2E is shorter than Persona-Driven due to content length
observations.recommendation: Consider min-height or flexbox stretch to equalize card heights

observations.description: Three Pillars cards have unequal heights - Vision Analysis card is taller due to more content
observations.recommendation: Use CSS Grid with align-items: stretch or set consistent min-height

observations.description: Step indicators (1,2,3) remain horizontal at tablet width while content stacks vertically, creating visual disconnect
observations.location: Homepage How It Works section at 768px
observations.recommendation: Either stack the indicators vertically at tablet width, or keep content in 3 columns longer

observations.description: Sidebar navigation in methodology page lacks active state indicator for current section
observations.recommendation: Add JavaScript to highlight current section on scroll, or use CSS :target selector

observations.description: Code block in homepage is cut off at top, showing partial code without full context
observations.recommendation: Ensure code snippet starts from a meaningful point (the JSDoc comment)

observations.description: Footer columns could benefit from more consistent vertical alignment with logo section
Mobile layout at 375px properly stacks all content into single column
CTA buttons stack vertically at mobile but 'See how it works →' link appears orphaned
observations.recommendation: Consider centering the arrow link or giving it button-like styling at mobile

strengths: Consistent color palette and design tokens
Polished gradient effects and subtle animations
Good use of whitespace in most sections
areasForImprovement: Card height consistency in grid layouts
Step indicator responsive behavior at tablet
